faq.description: Have another question? Contact us by email.
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our customer support team

items.question: Will Glow slow down my Shopify store?
items.answer: Not at all. Glow is built with lightweight principles, loading asynchronously. Your site stays fast, and your customers stay happy. We use a zero-drag script that won't impact your loading speed.

items.question: Do my customers need to download an app?
items.answer: Never. Customers add their membership card directly to their phone's native wallet (Apple Wallet or Google Pay). It's one-tap access with zero friction. No app downloads, no passwords to remember.

items.question: Can I migrate from Smile or Yotpo?
items.answer: Yes. We offer a clean import tool. Bring your existing customer points over to a more beautiful home in seconds. Our migration wizard handles everything automatically.

items.question: Is it customizable for my specific niche?
items.answer: Whether you sell handmade ceramics, artisan jewelry, or digital brushes, Glow's UI is a canvas. You control the colors, the icons, and the vibe. Real-time preview lets you see changes instantly.

items.question: What happens if I exceed my member limit?
items.answer: You'll receive a notification when you're approaching your plan limit. You can upgrade anytime with one click. Your existing members and their points are preserved during the upgrade.

items.question: How does the Apple Wallet integration work?
items.answer: When a customer joins your loyalty program, they receive a beautifully designed digital card that can be added to Apple Wallet or Google Pay with one tap. The card updates automatically when they earn points.
